Trigger.name: Etch

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) traces? the outline of a rune in the air with .+\. The edges catch fire as it hurtles towards (.+) and explodes
^(\w+) traces? the outline of a rune in the air with .+\. The edges catch fire as it hurtles towards (.+), clipping
^(\w+) traces? the outline of a rune in the air with .+\. The edges catch fire as it hurtles towards (.+) and \w+ is unable
